other_tests.findings: The liver is diffusely echogenic consistent with hepatic steatosis. No focal liver mass. No intrahepatic biliary dilation. The CBD measures 0.5 cm. Innumerable stones are seen filling the lumen of the gallbladder with gallbladder wall edema. The pancreas is unremarkable but partially visualized due to overlying bowel gas. The spleen is normal measuring 10.1 cm. No hydronephrosis in either kidney. The right kidney measures 10.8 cm and the left kidney measures 10.6 cm. A nonobstructing crystal measuring 9 mm is noted at the upper pole of the left kidney.
